episodes.title: Awakening
episodes.description: When Mateo’s comic creation, Z-Blob, follows him from a dream back to Brooklyn, Mateo and his sister realize the Dream World is real, and in danger!

episodes.title: Dream Chasers
episodes.description: After a daring mission to save their friend in the Dream World, Mateo and Izzie find the nightmare has followed them back to the Waking World.

episodes.title: Chased Dreamers
episodes.description: To craft their own hourglasses and become official Dream Chasers for the Night Bureau, Mateo and his friends must defeat the Dream Forge guardian.

episodes.title: The Dream Forge
episodes.description: As time runs out to face the Dream Forge and become official Dream Chasers, Mateo and his friends enlist the help of the mysterious Dream Bandit.

episodes.title: Peak Performance
episodes.description: The search for the Sandman leads Mateo and the others to the tallest mountain in the Dream World, but Lunia's hourglass puts a target on their backs.

episodes.title: The Anomaly
episodes.description: A surprise visit from the Chief Inspector of the Night Bureau forces Mateo to hide Z-Blob, who goes on an adventure in the heart of Brooklyn.

episodes.title: Cheat Code
episodes.description: Competing over who can ask Zoey to join their Sheep Week team, Logan cheats and unwittingly endangers the video game based Cyber Realm.

episodes.title: The Bigger Picture
episodes.description: When the kids meddle in their teacher’s dream to find test answers, they realize that in dreams, sweet little Ms. Putnam isn’t so sweet... or little!

episodes.title: Short Sheeped
episodes.description: Logan’s desperation to prove himself leads to his capture by the Nightmare King, which leaves his friends to face the Sheep Week finals alone.

episodes.title: The Grim Escape
episodes.description: The Dream Chasers rush to save Logan from the Shadowkeep’s dungeon, but the liberators soon become the prisoners in a nightmarish twist of fate.

episodes.title: Dreamer's Block
episodes.description: A mysterious dome blocks Mateo and the others from leaving their dream landing, and Zoey and Albert are their only hope of escape.

episodes.title: Monkey and the Bandit
episodes.description: With Albert captured by the Night Hunter and Z-Blob detained by Agent Strick, it’s time for a dual rescue in the Waking World and the Dream World!

episodes.title: Private Eye
episodes.description: Detective Izzie takes the case of Mateo’s missing comic book while Nova, the head of the Insomniacs, probes into a mystery of her own.

episodes.title: Songs of the Mist
episodes.description: The hunt for the Sandman, the only one who can repair Lunia’s hourglass, brings the kids to the dangerous Murky Realm, where memories go to die!

episodes.title: Sweet Dreams
episodes.description: Determined to give the Insomniac’s a night of good dreams, Izzie and friends bring them to the Candy Realm; but nowhere is safe from Nightmare King.

episodes.title: The Worthy Dreamer
episodes.description: The Dream Chasers arrive at Castle Nocturnia hoping to find the key to defeating the Nightmare King, but the castle won’t reveal its secrets easily.

episodes.title: The Light of Nocturnia
episodes.description: The Dream Chasers rush to crack the code to reveal Lunia’s secrets while the Nightmare King presses a full-scale assault on Castle Nocturnia.

episodes.title: Night Hunted
episodes.description: The Nightmare King begins to open a rift to the Waking World while Mateo presses Oz for the truth about Lunia’s battle with the Nightmare King.

episodes.title: The Rift
episodes.description: A night terror is on the hunt at the fall festival and so is the Night Hunter, who appears in the Waking World with a brand-new threat for Mateo.

episodes.title: Enter the Nightmare
episodes.description: The barrier to the Waking World has been torn and the Nightmare King invades Brooklyn, where the Dream Chasers must make their final stand!
